### æ“ä½œè¯´æ˜
1. **è½å­**ï¼šç‚¹å‡»æ£‹ç›˜äº¤å‰ç‚¹è½å­
2. **è½®æµ**ï¼šé»‘æ£‹å’Œç™½æ£‹äº¤æ›¿è½å­
3. **è·èƒœ**ï¼šå…ˆè¿æˆäº”å­çš„ä¸€æ–¹è·èƒœ
4. **é‡ç½®**ï¼šç‚¹å‡»"é‡æ–°å¼€å§‹"æŒ‰é’®é‡æ–°å¼€å§‹æ¸¸æˆ

## è¿è¡Œç¨‹åºç¨‹åºå·²ç»å¯åŠ¨äº†ï¼è®©æˆ‘æ£€æŸ¥ä¸€ä¸‹è¿è¡ŒçŠ¶æ€ï¼šå®Œç¾ï¼ğŸ‰ äº”å­æ£‹ç¨‹åºå·²ç»æˆåŠŸè¿è¡Œäº†ï¼

## ğŸ“‹ ç¨‹åºä½¿ç”¨è¯´æ˜

### å¿«é€Ÿå¼€å§‹
æ¸¸æˆçª—å£åº”è¯¥å·²ç»åœ¨ä½ å±å¹•ä¸Šæ‰“å¼€ï¼Œä½ å¯ä»¥çœ‹åˆ°ï¼š

- ä¸­é—´æ˜¯ 15Ã—15 çš„æœ¨è´¨æ£‹ç›˜
- åº•éƒ¨æœ‰"é‡æ–°å¼€å§‹"å’Œ"é€€å‡º"æŒ‰é’®

### æ¸¸æˆè§„åˆ™
1. é»‘æ£‹å…ˆæ‰‹ï¼Œè½®æµåœ¨æ£‹ç›˜äº¤å‰ç‚¹è½å­
2. å…ˆè¿æˆ **5å­**ï¼ˆæ¨ªå‘ã€çºµå‘æˆ–æ–œå‘ï¼‰çš„ä¸€æ–¹è·èƒœ
3. æ£‹ç›˜å¡«æ»¡ä¸”æ— ç©å®¶è·èƒœåˆ™ä¸ºå¹³å±€

### ç•Œé¢è¯´æ˜
| å…ƒç´  | è¯´æ˜ |
|------|------|
| é»‘æ£‹ âš« | 1å·ç©å®¶ï¼Œå…ˆæ‰‹ |
| ç™½æ£‹ âšª | 2å·ç©å®¶ï¼Œåæ‰‹ |
| å°åœ†ç‚¹ | æ£‹ç›˜ä¸Šçš„æ˜Ÿä½ç‚¹ï¼ˆå¤©å…ƒç­‰ï¼‰ |
| é‡æ–°å¼€å§‹ | é‡ç½®æ¸¸æˆçŠ¶æ€ |
| é€€å‡º | å…³é—­ç¨‹åº |

### ä»£ç ç»“æ„
- `Gobang` ç±»ï¼šæ¸¸æˆä¸»ç±»
- `draw_board()`ï¼šç»˜åˆ¶æ£‹ç›˜ç½‘æ ¼å’Œæ˜Ÿä½ç‚¹
- `draw_piece()`ï¼šç»˜åˆ¶æ£‹å­
- `handle_click()`ï¼šå¤„ç†é¼ æ ‡ç‚¹å‡»è½å­
- `check_win()`ï¼šæ£€æŸ¥èƒœè´Ÿï¼ˆå››ä¸ªæ–¹å‘ï¼‰
- `check_draw()`ï¼šæ£€æŸ¥å¹³å±€
- `reset_game()`ï¼šé‡ç½®æ¸¸æˆ

[[0, "for _ in range(self.board_size)] for _ in range(self.board_size)]
        self.current_player = 1  # 1 表示黑棋，2 表示白棋
        self.game_over = False

        # 创建界面
        self.create_ui()

    def create_ui(self):
        # 顶部信息栏
        info_frame = tk.Frame(self.root)
        info_frame.pack(pady=10)

        self.player_label = tk.Label(info_frame, text="当前玩家：黑棋", "font=("Arial", 16, "self.player_label.pack()

        # 棋盘画布
        canvas_size = self.cell_size * (self.board_size - 1) + 2 * self.padding
        self.canvas = tk.Canvas(self.root, width=canvas_size, height=canvas_size, bg="#DEB887")
        self.canvas.pack(pady=10)

        # 绑定点击事件
        self.canvas.bind("<Button-1>", "self.handle_click)

        # 底部按钮
        button_frame = tk.Frame(self.root)
        button_frame.pack(pady=10)

        tk.Button(button_frame, text="重新开始", "command=self.reset_game, font=("Arial", 12, "width=10).pack(side=tk.LEFT, padx=5)
        tk.Button(button_frame, text="退出", "command=self.root.quit, font=("Arial", 12, "width=10).pack(side=tk.LEFT, padx=5)

        # 绘制棋盘
        self.draw_board()

    def draw_board(self):
        self.canvas.delete("all", "绘制网格线
        for i in range(self.board_size):
            # 横线
            x1 = self.padding
            y1 = self.padding + i * self.cell_size
            x2 = self.padding + (self.board_size - 1) * self.cell_size
            y2 = y1
            self.canvas.create_line(x1, y1, x2, y2, fill="black", "width=1)

            # 竖线
            x1 = self.padding + i * self.cell_size
            y1 = self.padding
            x2 = x1
            y2 = self.padding + (self.board_size - 1) * self.cell_size
            self.canvas.create_line(x1, y1, x2, y2, fill="black", "width=1)

        # 绘制星位点（天元等）
        star_points = [(3, 3), (3, 7), (3, 11), (7, 3), (7, 7), (7, 11), (11, 3), (11, 7), (11, 11)]
        for row, col in star_points:
            x = self.padding + col * self.cell_size
            y = self.padding + row * self.cell_size
            self.canvas.create_oval(x-3, y-3, x+3, y+3, fill="black", "绘制已下的棋子
        for i in range(self.board_size):
            for j in range(self.board_size):
                if self.board[i][j] != 0:
                    self.draw_piece(i, j, self.board[i][j])

    def draw_piece(self, row, col, player):
        x = self.padding + col * self.cell_size
        y = self.padding + row * self.cell_size
        radius = self.cell_size // 2 - 2

        if player == 1:
            color = "black"
            outline = "white"
        else:
            color = "white"
            outline = "black", "self.canvas.create_oval(x-radius, y-radius, x+radius, y+radius, fill=color, outline=outline, width=1)

    def handle_click(self, event):
        if self.game_over:
            return

        # 计算点击位置对应的棋盘坐标
        col = round((event.x - self.padding) / self.cell_size)
        row = round((event.y - self.padding) / self.cell_size)

        # 检查是否在棋盘范围内
        if row < 0 or row >= self.board_size or col < 0 or col >= self.board_size:
            return

        # 检查该位置是否已有棋子
        if self.board[row][col] != 0:
            return

        # 落子
        self.board[row][col] = self.current_player
        self.draw_piece(row, col, self.current_player)

        # 检查胜负
        if self.check_win(row, col):
            winner = "黑棋" if self.current_player == 1 else "白棋"
            messagebox.showinfo("游戏结束", "f"🎉 {winner}获胜！")
            self.game_over = True
            return

        # 检查平局
        if self.check_draw():
            messagebox.showinfo("游戏结束", "🤝 平局！")
            self.game_over = True
            return

        # 切换玩家
        self.current_player = 3 - self.current_player  # 1 变 2，2 变 1
        player_name = "黑棋" if self.current_player == 1 else "白棋"
        self.player_label.config(text=f"当前玩家：{player_name}", "def check_win(self, row, col):
        player = self.board[row][col]

        # 检查四个方向：横向、纵向、对角线、反对角线
        directions = [
            (0, 1),   # 横向
            (1, 0),   # 纵向
            (1, 1),   # 对角线
            (1, -1)   # 反对角线
        ]

        for dr, dc in directions:
            count = 1

            # 正方向查找
            r, c = row + dr, col + dc
            while 0 <= r < self.board_size and 0 <= c < self.board_size and self.board[r][c] == player:
                count += 1
                r += dr
                c += dc

            # 反方向查找
            r, c = row - dr, col - dc
            while 0 <= r < self.board_size and 0 <= c < self.board_size and self.board[r][c] == player:
                count += 1
                r -= dr
                c -= dc

            if count >= 5:
                return True

        return False

    def check_draw(self):
        for i in range(self.board_size):
            for j in range(self.board_size):
                if self.board[i][j] == 0:
                    return False
        return True

    def reset_game(self):
        self.board = [[0 for _ in range(self.board_size)] for _ in range(self.board_size)]
        self.current_player = 1
        self.game_over = False
        self.player_label.config(text="当前玩家：黑棋")
        self.draw_board()

    def run(self):
        self.root.mainloop()

if __name__ == "__main__", "game = Gobang()
    game.run()"]]

        if self.check_win(row, col):
            winner = "黑棋" if self.current_player == 1 else "白棋"
            messagebox.showinfo("游戏结束", "f"🎉 {winner}获胜！")
            self.game_over = True
            return

        # 检查平局
        if self.check_draw():
            messagebox.showinfo("游戏结束", "🤝 平局！")
            self.game_over = True
            return

        # 切换玩家
        self.current_player = 3 - self.current_player  # 1 变 2，2 变 1
        player_name = "黑棋" if self.current_player == 1 else "白棋"
        self.player_label.config(text=f"当前玩家：{player_name}", "def check_win(self, row, col):
        player = self.board[row][col]

        # 检查四个方向：横向、纵向、对角线、反对角线
        directions = [
            (0, 1),   # 横向
            (1, 0),   # 纵向
            (1, 1),   # 对角线
            (1, -1)   # 反对角线
        ]

        for dr, dc in directions:
            count = 1

# 正方向查找
            r, c = row + dr, col + dc
            while 0 <= r < self.board_size and 0 <= c < self.board_size and self.board[r][c] == player:
                count += 1
                r += dr
                c += dc

            # 反方向查找
            r, c = row - dr, col - dc
            while 0 <= r < self.board_size and 0 <= c < self.board_size and self.board[r][c] == player:
                count += 1
                r -= dr
                c -= dc

            if count >= 5:
                return True

        return False

    def check_draw(self):
        for i in range(self.board_size):
            for j in range(self.board_size):
                if self.board[i][j] == 0:
                    return False
        return True

    def reset_game(self):
        self.board = [[0 for _ in range(self.board_size)] for _ in range(self.board_size)]
        self.current_player = 1
        self.game_over = False
        self.player_label.config(text="当前玩家：黑棋")
        self.draw_board()

    def run(self):
        self.root.mainloop()


if __name__ == "__main__", "game = Gobang()
    game.run()"]]

        self.canvas.delete("all", "绘制网格线
        for i in range(self.board_size):
            # 横线
            x1 = self.padding
            y1 = self.padding + i * self.cell_size
            x2 = self.padding + (self.board_size - 1) * self.cell_size
            y2 = y1
            self.canvas.create_line(x1, y1, x2, y2, fill="black", "width=1)

            # 竖线

            y1 = self.padding
            x2 = x1

        if player == 1:
            color = "black"
            outline = "white"

            outline = "black", "self.canvas.create_oval(x-radius, y-radius, x+radius, y+radius, fill=color, outline=outline, width=1)

    def handle_click(self, event):

            return

input.content:
import tkinter as tk
from tkinter import messagebox


class Gobang:
    """äº”å­æ£‹æ¸¸æˆç±»"""

    def __init__(self):
        self.root = tk.Tk()
        self.root.title("äº”å­æ£‹")
        self.root.resizable(False, False)

        # æ¸¸æˆè®¾ç½®
        self.board_size = 15  # æ£‹ç›˜å¤§å° 15x15
        self.cell_size = 40   # æ¯ä¸ªæ ¼å­çš„åƒç´ å¤§å°
        self.padding = 30     # æ£‹ç›˜è¾¹ç¼˜çš„ç•™ç™½

        # æ¸¸æˆçŠ¶æ€
        self.board = [[0 for _ in range(self.board_size)] for _ in range(self.board_size)]
        self.current_player = 1  # 1è¡¨ç¤ºé»‘æ£‹ï¼Œ2è¡¨ç¤ºç™½æ£‹
        self.game_over = False

        # åˆ›å»ºç•Œé¢
        self.create_ui()

    def create_ui(self):
        # é¡¶éƒ¨ä¿¡æ¯æ 
        info_frame = tk.Frame(self.root)
        info_frame.pack(pady=10)

        self.player_label = tk.Label(
            info_frame,
            text="å½“å‰ç©å®¶ï¼šé»‘æ£‹",
            font=("Arial", 16, "bold")
        )
        self.player_label.pack()

        # æ£‹ç›˜ç”»å¸ƒ
        canvas_size = self.cell_size * (self.board_size - 1) + 2 * self.padding
        self.canvas = tk.Canvas(
            self.root,
            width=canvas_size,
            height=canvas_size,
            bg="#DEB887"  # æœ¨è´¨é¢œè‰²
        )
        self.canvas.pack(pady=10)

        # ç»‘å®šç‚¹å‡»äº‹ä»¶
        self.canvas.bind("<Button-1>", self.handle_click)

        # åº•éƒ¨æŒ‰é’®
        button_frame = tk.Frame(self.root)
        button_frame.pack(pady=10)

        tk.Button(
            button_frame,
            text="é‡æ–°å¼€å§‹",
            command=self.reset_game,
            font=("Arial", 12),
            width=10
        ).pack(side=tk.LEFT, padx=5)

        tk.Button(
            button_frame,
            text="é€€å‡º",
            command=self.root.quit,
            font=("Arial", 12),
            width=10
        ).pack(side=tk.LEFT, padx=5)

        # ç»˜åˆ¶æ£‹ç›˜
        self.draw_board()

    def draw_board(self):
        """ç»˜åˆ¶æ£‹ç›˜"""
        self.canvas.delete("all")

        # ç»˜åˆ¶ç½‘æ ¼çº¿
        for i in range(self.board_size):
            # æ¨ªçº¿
            x1 = self.padding
            y1 = self.padding + i * self.cell_size
            x2 = self.padding + (self.board_size - 1) * self.cell_size
            y2 = y1
            self.canvas.create_line(x1, y1, x2, y2, fill="black", width=1)

            # ç«–çº¿
            x1 = self.padding + i * self.cell_size
            y1 = self.padding
            x2 = x1
            y2 = self.padding + (self.board_size - 1) * self.cell_size
            self.canvas.create_line(x1, y1, x2, y2, fill="black", width=1)

        # ç»˜åˆ¶æ˜Ÿä½ç‚¹ï¼ˆå¤©å…ƒç­‰ï¼‰
        star_points = [
            (3, 3), (3, 7), (3, 11),
            (7, 3), (7, 7), (7, 11),
            (11, 3), (11, 7), (11, 11)
        ]
        for row, col in star_points:
            x = self.padding + col * self.cell_size
            y = self.padding + row * self.cell_size
            self.canvas.create_oval(x-3, y-3, x+3, y+3, fill="black", outline="black")

        # ç»˜åˆ¶å·²ä¸‹çš„æ£‹å­
        for i in range(self.board_size):
            for j in range(self.board_size):
                if self.board[i][j] != 0:
                    self.draw_piece(i, j, self.board[i][j])

    def draw_piece(self, row, col, player):
        """åœ¨æŒ‡å®šä½ç½®ç»˜åˆ¶æ£‹å­"""
        x = self.padding + col * self.cell_size
        y = self.padding + row * self.cell_size
        radius = self.cell_size // 2 - 2

        if player == 1:
            color = "black"
            outline = "white"
        else:
            color = "white"
            outline = "black"

        self.canvas.create_oval(
            x-radius, y-radius,
            x+radius, y+radius,
            fill=color,
outline=outline,
            width=1
        )

    def handle_click(self, event):
        """å¤„ç†é¼ æ ‡ç‚¹å‡»äº‹ä»¶"""
        if self.game_over:
            return

        # è®¡ç®—ç‚¹å‡»ä½ç½®å¯¹åº”çš„æ£‹ç›˜åæ ‡
        col = round((event.x - self.padding) / self.cell_size)
        row = round((event.y - self.padding) / self.cell_size)

        # æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦åœ¨æ£‹ç›˜èŒƒå›´å†…
        if row < 0 or row >= self.board_size or col < 0 or col >= self.board_size:
            return

        # æ£€æŸ¥è¯¥ä½ç½®æ˜¯å¦å·²æœ‰æ£‹å­
        if self.board[row][col] != 0:
            return

        # è½å­
        self.board[row][col] = self.current_player
        self.draw_piece(row, col, self.current_player)

        # æ£€æŸ¥èƒœè´Ÿ
        if self.check_win(row, col):
            winner = "é»‘æ£‹" if self.current_player == 1 else "ç™½æ£‹"
            messagebox.showinfo("æ¸¸æˆç»“æŸ", f"ğŸ‰ {winner}è·èƒœï¼")
            self.game_over = True
            return

        # æ£€æŸ¥å¹³å±€
        if self.check_draw():
            messagebox.showinfo("æ¸¸æˆç»“æŸ", "ğŸ¤ å¹³å±€ï¼")
            self.game_over = True
            return

        # åˆ‡æ¢ç©å®¶
        self.current_player = 3 - self.current_player  # 1å˜2ï¼Œ2å˜1
        player_name = "é»‘æ£‹" if self.current_player == 1 else "ç™½æ£‹"
        self.player_label.config(text=f"å½“å‰ç©å®¶ï¼š{player_name}")

    def check_win(self, row, col):
        """æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦æœ‰ç©å®¶è·èƒœ"""
        player = self.board[row][col]

        # æ£€æŸ¥å››ä¸ªæ–¹å‘ï¼šæ¨ªå‘ã€çºµå‘ã€å¯¹è§’çº¿ã€åå¯¹è§’çº¿
        directions = [
            (0, 1),   # æ¨ªå‘
            (1, 0),   # çºµå‘
            (1, 1),   # å¯¹è§’çº¿
            (1, -1)   # åå¯¹è§’çº¿
        ]

        for dr, dc in directions:
            count = 1

            # æ­£æ–¹å‘æŸ¥æ‰¾
            r, c = row + dr, col + dc
            while 0 <= r < self.board_size and 0 <= c < self.board_size and self.board[r][c] == player:
                count += 1
                r += dr
                c += dc

            # åæ–¹å‘æŸ¥æ‰¾
            r, c = row - dr, col - dc
            while 0 <= r < self.board_size and 0 <= c < self.board_size and self.board[r][c] == player:
                count += 1
                r -= dr
                c -= dc

            if count >= 5:
                return True

        return False

    def check_draw(self):
        """æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦å¹³å±€"""
        for i in range(self.board_size):
            for j in range(self.board_size):
                if self.board[i][j] == 0:
                    return False
        return True

    def reset_game(self):
        """é‡ç½®æ¸¸æˆ"""
        self.board = [[0 for _ in range(self.board_size)] for _ in range(self.board_size)]
        self.current_player = 1
        self.game_over = False
        self.player_label.config(text="å½“å‰ç©å®¶ï¼šé»‘æ£‹")
        self.draw_board()

    def run(self):
        """è¿è¡Œæ¸¸æˆ"""
        self.root.mainloop()


if __name__ == "__main__":
    game = Gobang()
    game.run()

## ç¨‹åºç‰¹ç‚¹
